name: Bustle
description:
Bustle is a zany local multiplayer party game where bus companies fight for the areas they service to. Choose to drive a bus for your CEO throughout the city, knock the competition's buses out of the area and claim the city one block at a time.

This is a game developed by Canadian indie game studio, Moonwalk Studios. Over the course of 4 - 5 months, we developed the current build of Bustle from the ground up, including engine, art, design, etc. This current build was showcased at the Level Up Student Showcase in Toronto, Canada in April 2017.

This Level Up TO 2017 build features:

  • 4 playable teams
  • 12 playable level variants
  • 4 powerups
  • Ongoing game tracking system

This is an ongoing project that we are developing and aiming to release by 2018. Feel free to download and play the game if you missed the opportunity at Level UP this year or if you just want to try out.

Any feedback is welcome as we are continuously improving the game. You can either leave a comment below or contact us through our Facebook or Twitter pages at @MoonwalkGameStudios and @MoonwalkStudios respectively.

Note: This game can only be played with controllers on PC and supports play between 2-4 players.
